text: The women's 4 × 100 metres relay event at the 2019 African Games was held on 27 and 28 August in Rabat. ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Joy Udo-Gabriel Mercy Ntia-Obong Jasper Bukola Adekunle Rosemary Chukwuma Blessing Okagbare* |width=200 valign=top|' Tebogo Mamathu Tamzin Thomas Patience Ntshingila Taylon Bieldt Lynique Beneke* |width=200 valign=top|' Maximila Imali Milcent Ndoro Maureen Nyatichi Thomas Joan Cherono |} *Athletes who competed in heats only ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 3 teams of each heat (Q) plus the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !!
